author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ALVIN FORECAST TO A BECOME POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TODAY...
summary: ...ALVIN FORECAST TO A BECOME POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Sat May 31 the center of Alvin was located near 20.0, -109.3 with movement N at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ALVIN FORECAST TO A BECOME POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM MST Sat May 31 the center of Alvin was located near 20.0, -109.3 with movement N at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Alvin (EP1/EP012025)
